Hero.description: I build digital bridges between <culture>culture</culture> and <tech>technology</tech>. Front-End Developer specializing in responsive and immersive interfaces.

projects.label: ACTIVE_DEPLOYMENTS
projects.intro: A selection of projects blending software engineering and cultural aesthetics.

02.title: AFRICAN Culture
02.description: Educational site about proverbs and ancestral wisdom.

03.title: Visual Branding
03.description: Visual identity for a pan-African fashion brand.

fusion.title: Bridging Heritage & Digital Future
fusion.description: My work isn't just about code. It's a mission: infusing the soul of African art into the rigid structures of the Modern Web.

4.title: African MarketPlace "AfroShop"
4.description: E-commerce platform showcasing local craftsmanship with a modern interface inspired by African textiles. Includes a payment system tailored for African markets.

2.title: Application "Cameroon Culture"
2.description: Immersive educational app exploring Cameroon's cultural riches. Features visual galleries, historical documents, and interactive experiences.

3.title: Visual Identity "Ngano Fashion"
3.description: Full artistic direction for a contemporary African fashion brand. Logo, color palette, packaging, and website design inspired by Adinkra patterns.

1.title: Mini-site "Culture Africa"
1.description: Interactive site to explore and promote African culture through animations and visual storytelling. Includes an interactive map of African traditions.

5.title: African Visual Customizer
5.description: Web tool for customizing designs with authentic African patterns. High-resolution export for print and digital media.

6.title: Academic Project "Angular Commerce"
6.description: E-commerce application developed with Angular in an academic setting, focusing on performance and user experience.

bio.quote: I don't just code websites. I build digital bridges between ancestral tradition and future innovation.
bio.p1: With a degree in Computer Science (Systems & Networks), I quickly pivoted to my true passion: creation. My rigorous technical background allows me to understand the machine, but my artist's soul guides my fingers.
bio.p2: My mission is clear: to counter the uniformity of the Western web by injecting African visual DNA (Adinkra patterns, warm palettes, storytelling) into ultra-high-performance React & Next.js architectures.

2025.title: FULLSTACK EXPANSION
2025.subtitle: Backend Integration
2025.desc: Database architecture with MongoDB and REST ExpressJS API creation. The missing link.

2024.title: CULTURAL UI/UX
2024.subtitle: Design System
2024.desc: Defining my graphic signature: merging modern minimalism with the complexity of African patterns.

2023.title: FRONTEND SPECIALIST
2023.subtitle: Framework Mastery
2023.desc: Deep dive into the React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS ecosystem. Transitioning from spaghetti code to modular architecture.

2022.title: SYSTEM INIT
2022.subtitle: The Beginning
2022.desc: First line of code. HTML, CSS, PHP. Understanding how the web breathes.

heritage.title: Heritage First
heritage.desc: Code is universal, but identity is local. I code with pride.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.desc: A beautiful site that is slow is useless. I optimize every pixel and every function.

clean.title: Clean Architecture
clean.desc: Maintainable, scalable, and secure code. No shortcuts.

cta.title: READY TO COLLABORATE?
cta.subtitle: Initialize communication protocol to start a unique project.

hero.description: I treat African visual heritage as source code. Every pattern is a data-set of history, reinvented for the digital architecture of tomorrow.

1.title: WAX_CORE
1.desc: Vector reinterpretation of Wax color flows for high-performance site backgrounds.

2.title: ADINKRA_UI
2.desc: Philosophical symbols converted into intelligent navigation icons.

3.title: NDOP_GRID
3.desc: Cameroonian sacred geometry adapted for modern CSS grid systems.

4.title: KENTE_STRIPE
4.desc: Weaving rhythms transformed into responsive section dividers.

0.text: Knowledge is like a Baobab tree; one person's arms cannot embrace it.

1.text: Innovation is born from the deepest roots.

2.text: If you want to go far, go together.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.subtitle: Tech x Culture
specs.main_text: Web uniformity is a system error. My mission is to reinject algorithmic diversity using African visual structures.

framework.title: Cultural Framework v1.0
framework.desc: Ready for integration in modern UX/UI systems.
